changes.description: Add children to communities to avoid re-compute.
Reorganize and rename workflows and their outputs.
Rework API to accept callbacks.
Add LMM Manager and Factory, to support provider registration
Add NLP graph extraction.
Add pipeline_start and pipeline_end callbacks.
Move embeddings snapshots to the workflow runner.
Remove config inheritance, hydration, and automatic env var overlays.
Rework the update output storage structure.
Add caching to NLP extractor.
Add vector store id reference to embeddings config.
Export NLP community reports prompt.
Fix DRIFT search on Azure AI Search.
Fix StopAsyncIteration catch.
Fix missing embeddings workflow in FastGraphRAG.
Fix proper use of n_depth for drift search
Fix report generation recursion.
Fix summarization over large datasets for inc indexing. Fix relationship summarization
Optimize data iteration by removing some iterrows from code
Patch json mode for community reports
Properly increment text unit IDs during updates.
Refactor config defaults from constants to type-safe, hierarchical dataclass.
Require explicit azure auth settings when using AOI.
Separates graph pruning for differential usage.
Tuck flow functions under their workflow modules.
Update fnllm. Remove unused libs.
Use ModelProvider for query module
Use shared schema for final outputs.
add dynamic retry logic.
add option to prepend metadata into chunks
cleanup query code duplication.
implemented multi-index querying for api layer
multi index query cli support
remove unused columns and change property document_attribute_columns to metadata
update multi-index query to support new workflows
